channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for PR

item.title: Report I-2024050061
item.description:
Report I-2024050061

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-23T15:12:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-09
  • City: Carolina
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 05/09/2024 shipment was discovered during the shipment inspection process to contain hidden dangerous goods at the DHL SJU service station, 30 Central Sector Rd Caribbean Airport Facility, Carolina, PR 00979. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3481 Lithium ion batteries contained in equipment Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging(If any): Packaging Type: Receptacle Material of Construction: Metal Package Capacity: 16 g Amount in Package: 16 g Number in Shipment: 1,, Number Failed: 1
